args.content:
import Mathlib

universe u v

variable {M : Type u} {N : Type v}

-- Abstract predicates to represent the smooth manifold/continuous/smooth/homotopy notions.
variable (IsSmoothManifold : (Type _) → Prop)
variable (C0 : (M → N) → Prop)
variable (SmoothMap : (M → N) → Prop)
variable (Homotopic : (M → N) → (M → N) → Prop)

theorem continuous_map_homotopic_to_smooth_map
  (hM : IsSmoothManifold M) (hN : IsSmoothManifold N) {f : M → N} (hf : C0 f) :
  ∃ g : M → N, SmoothMap g ∧ Homotopic f g := by sorry

import Mathlib

universe u v

variable {M : Type u} {N : Type v}

-- Abstract predicates to represent the smooth manifold/continuous/smooth/homotopy notions.
variable (IsSmoothManifold : ∀ X : Type _, Prop)
variable (ContinuousMap : ∀ {X Y : Type _}, (X → Y) → Prop)
variable (SmoothMap : ∀ {X Y : Type _}, (X → Y) → Prop)
variable (Homotopic : ∀ {X Y : Type _}, (X → Y) → (X → Y) → Prop)

theorem continuous_map_homotopic_to_smooth_map
  (hM : IsSmoothManifold M) (hN : IsSmoothManifold N) {f : M → N} (hf : ContinuousMap f) :
  ∃ g : M → N, SmoothMap g ∧ Homotopic f g := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem continuous_map_homotopic_to_smooth_map
  {M : Type _} {N : Type _}
  (IsSmoothManifold : ∀ X : Type _, Prop)
  (ContinuousMap : ∀ {X Y : Type _}, (X → Y) → Prop)
  (SmoothMap : ∀ {X Y : Type _}, (X → Y) → Prop)
  (Homotopic : ∀ {X Y : Type _}, (X → Y) → (X → Y) → Prop)
  (hM : IsSmoothManifold M) (hN : IsSmoothManifold N) {f : M → N} (hf : ContinuousMap f) :
  ∃ g : M → N, SmoothMap g ∧ Homotopic f g := by sorry
